lords_slice.name: Lord's Slice
lords_slice.desc: Makes the Hidden Tendril from 'Hidden Tendril' contract, pulling both the user and enemy closer.

equalizer.name: Equalizer
equalizer.desc: A counter that leaves your opponent open

judgement.name: Judgement
judgement.desc: Summons a black casting circle before enveloping your target in black tendrils and tearing them apart.
